methods.javadoc: Returns context base register or null if one has not been defined by the language.
methods.name: getContextBaseRegister
methods.comment: Returns context base register or null if one has not been defined by the language.

methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment: Returns the largest register located at the specified address

methods.name: getRegisters
methods.comment: Returns all registers located at the specified address

methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment:
Returns the smallest register at the specified address whose size is 
 greater than or equal the specified size.

params.name: size
params.comment:
the size of the register (in bytes).  A value of 0 will return the 
 largest register at the specified addr

methods.javadoc:
Returns the register with the given name;
@param name the name of the register to retrieve
methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment: Returns the register with the given name;

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the register to retrieve

methods.javadoc:
Return array of all registers.
@return all registers
methods.name: getRegisters

methods.javadoc:
Returns the array of vector registers, sorted first by size and then by offset
@return sorted vector registers
methods.name: getSortedVectorRegisters
methods.comment: Returns the array of vector registers, sorted first by size and then by offset

methods.name: compareVectorRegisters
methods.comment: Compares two vector registers, first by size (descending) and then by offset (ascending).

fields.javadoc: Collection of vector registers, sorted first by size and then by offset
fields.name: sortedVectorRegisters
fields.comment: Collection of vector registers, sorted first by size and then by offset
